Warnings
  • Static Error: prompt:///:1,37: The called signature: grid(list[Figure], FProperty, FProperty),
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/ColorModel/colorNames

Function list[str] colorNames()
Description Gives a sorted list of available color names that can be used by the color function.
Examples 
rascal>import vis::Figure;
ok
rascal>colorNames();
list[str]: ["aliceblue","antiquewhite","aqua","aquamarine","azure","beige","bisq»
ue","black","blanchedalmond","blue","blueviolet","brown","burlywood","cadetblue"»
,"chartreuse","chocolate","coral","cornflowerblu...
This functions can be used to create color tables. 
boxes = [ box([size(10, 10), fillColor(c)]) | c <- colorNames() ];
render(hvcat(boxes, width(500), left()));


Or a color table with the color names attached to the boxes: Static Error: prompt:///:1,37: The called signature: grid(list[Figure], FProperty, FProperty),
boxes = [ hcat([text(c), box([size(20, 20), fillColor(c)])],
               gap(5), center(), right())
        | c <- colorNames() 
        ];
render(grid(boxes, gap(200, 25), size(500)));
